panel.title: Dow AgroSciences Robotics - OEE/KPI
panel.preamble: Welcome to the ILS Automation installer for the Dwo AgroSciences Robotics OEE/KPI Application. Before continuing, please make sure that you have defined both tag provider and datasource in your Ignition Gateway.

panel.title: End User License Agreement (EULA)
panel.preamble: Click on the button below to view the license that specifies permissible use of the software to be installed. Select the checkbox to indicate acceptance of the terms. You must accept the license terms before proceeding.

panel.title: Database and Tag Provider Definitions\
panel.preamble: Specify tag provider and database connections as used by the DAS Robotics Application. A provider and datasource must be defined in the Ignition Gateway before installing the application.

panel.title: Install External Python
panel.preamble: This step adds Python scripts that are utilized by the application. The term "external" refers to the fact that these scripts are global and not part of an Ignition project.

panel.title: OEE/KPI Database Create and Alter Scripts
panel.preamble: This page provides the opportunity for either creating a new database instance or altering an existing instance to accommodate schema corrections. The actions here are performed against the previously-specified instance.

panel.title: OEE/KPI Database Create and Alter Scripts
panel.preamble: This page provides the opportunity for either creating a new database instance or altering an existing instance to accommodate schema corrections. The actions here are performed against the previously-specified instance.

panel.title: Install Modules
panel.preamble: This step installs the module which contains the parsing code for the DAS Robotics stacker log file. IMPORTANT: If this is the first time that you have installed this modules on your system, they will be placed in quarantine mode. To complete the installation, you will have to navigate to the Modules page and select the install option next to the module's listing.

panel.title: DAS Robotics OEE Main Project
panel.preamble:
KPI is the main Ignition project. This page provides artifacts for a clean, new installation or, alternatively, a merge with an existing version. A merge preserves any user modifications from a previous version.
NOTE: For the current EMChemicals project, the merge capability is still in development and should NOT be used.

panel.title: DAS Robotics OEE Parser Development Project
panel.preamble: This project is for developing and testing the stacker event log parser.

panel.title: Installation Summary
panel.preamble: The list below shows which of the installation steps have been completed. Selecting "Finish" will record the current version of ACE Ignition Applications in the Gateway internal database.

epilog.title: Installation Complete
epilog.preamble: The automated installation and configuration of the ACE Control Ignition Application is complete. There are just a few more manual steps required.
epilog.note: Newly created projects are installed disabled. They must be enabled before use.
Several modules with active components have been installed. A Gateway restart is required.
